title: WTB: Low grade T201 Street / Johnson
author: reisshead

posts.post_title: WTB: Low grade T201 Street / Johnson
posts.post_content:
Anyone willing to part with one of these?  Prefer SGC 10-40, but ungraded or PSA would be fine.  Send scans and/or questions to [url]rreisshead@aol.com[/url].
Thanks,  Bob

Hello
I have one that SGC deemed as "card was put back together with glue". It is mostly intact, kind of separating at one end of it's natural crease.

Any interest?

Frank L. 

Email me at [url]flastra@tampabay.rr.com[/url]
Thanks to all who replied.  Walter is now in the bag!::)
